DOC.brief_summary: This study is for patients who have participated in a previous study and who continue to receive benefit to have continued access to study drug and/or treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Protocol for Continued Patient Access to Study Drug
DOC.criteria: To be eligible patients must be currently receiving benefit in a Lilly study that has met its endpoints or has otherwise stopped. Patients must not be concurrently enrolled in any other type of medical research judged not to be scientifically or medically compatible with this study.
